project.description: Triggers a job according to conditions met.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: DISTRIBUTION
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Choose a Linux distribution to build a package for. Alternatively, you can choose "all" to build packages for all distributions in a single operation.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PACKAGE_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter package number within the release.

info.groovyScriptContent:
def suites = [ master: "dev", 'support': "stable", u: "u" ]
def properties = [
"debian-7-32": [operating_system: "debian", codename: "wheezy", architecture: "i386", package_type: "deb"], "debian-7-64": [operating_system: "debian", codename: "wheezy", architecture: "amd64", package_type: "deb"], "redhat-6-32": [operating_system: "rhel", codename: "el6", architecture: "i386", package_type: "rpm"], "redhat-6-64": [operating_system: "rhel", codename: "el6", architecture: "x86_64", package_type: "rpm"], "redhat-7-32": [operating_system: "rhel", codename: "el7", architecture: "i386", package_type: "rpm"], "redhat-7-64": [operating_system: "rhel", codename: "el7", architecture: "x86_64", package_type: "rpm"], "ubuntu-12.04-32": [operating_system: "ubuntu", codename: "precise", architecture: "i386", package_type: "deb"], "ubuntu-12.04-64": [operating_system: "ubuntu", codename: "precise", architecture: "amd64", package_type: "deb"], "ubuntu-14.04-32": [operating_system: "ubuntu", codename: "trusty", architecture: "i386", package_type: "deb"], "ubuntu-14.04-64": [operating_system: "ubuntu", codename: "trusty", architecture: "amd64", package_type: "deb"]
]
def suite = suites[BRANCH] def operating_system = properties[DISTRIBUTION]["operating_system"] def codename = properties[DISTRIBUTION]["codename"] def architecture = properties[DISTRIBUTION]["architecture"] def package_type = properties[DISTRIBUTION]["package_type"]
def deb_extension = "deb" def rpm_extension = "rpm"
def parameters = [
SUITE: suite, OPERATING_SYSTEM: operating_system, CODENAME: codename, ARCHITECTURE: architecture, PACKAGE_TYPE: package_type, DEB_EXTENSION: deb_extension, RPM_EXTENSION: rpm_extension
]
